artist: J. & E. Stevens Company, Cromwell, Connecticut, 1843-1950s
title: "Crown Bank" still bank
description: square one-story bank building with front door with \"BANK\" sign overhead; at back is a rounded niche above which is the coin slot; rounded \"coining\" architectural elements at corners of building; slanted roof with toothed decorative element at top; screw from front center above door to back center secures the bank closed
